original_solution_mapping.L1: He knows 50 people are showing up and he's hoping 40 more people will drop in for a total of 50+40 = <<50+40=90>>90 people
original_solution_mapping.L2: He's made 10 extravagant gift bags and 20 average bags for a total of 10+20 = <<10+20=30>>30 bags
original_solution_mapping.L3: He hopes 90 people will show up and has already made 30 bags so he needs to make 90-30 = <<90-30=60>>60 more gift bags

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1876.
    Returns: the number of additional gift bags Carl needs to make.
    """
    # L1
    known_attendees = 50 # 50 people will show up
    hoped_attendees = 40 # another 40 people will randomly show up
    total_expected_people = known_attendees + hoped_attendees

    # L2
    extravagant_bags = 10 # 10 extravagant gift bags
    average_bags = 20 # average gift bags for 20 people
    total_bags_made = extravagant_bags + average_bags

    # L3
    bags_needed = total_expected_people - total_bags_made

    # FA
    answer = bags_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He knows {known_attendees} people are showing up and he’s hoping {hoped_attendees} more people will drop in for a total of {known_attendees}+{hoped_attendees} = <<{known_attendees}+{hoped_attendees}={total_expected_people}>>{total_expected_people} people

He’s made {extravagant_bags} extravagant gift bags and {average_bags} average bags for a total of {extravagant_bags}+{average_bags} = <<{extravagant_bags}+{average_bags}={total_bags_made}>>{total_bags_made} bags

He hopes {total_expected_people} people will show up and has already made {total_bags_made} bags so he needs to make {total_expected_people}-{total_bags_made} = <<{total_expected_people}-{total_bags_made}={bags_needed}>>{bags_needed} more gift bags

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: He knows 50 people are showing up and he’s hoping 40 more people will drop in for a total of 50+40 = <<50+40=90>>90 people
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He’s made 10 extravagant gift bags and 20 average bags for a total of 10+20 = <<10+20=30>>30 bags
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He hopes 90 people will show up and has already made 20 bags so he needs to make 90-20 = <<90-20=70>>70 more gift bags

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'average_bags' (value: 20) was used instead of 'total_bags_made' (value: 30).
